text:
Since 9 November, when the 1st #vaccine against #COVID19 was announced,6⃣0⃣0⃣tweets were posted by #MEPs sharing their views on #CovidVaccine, #Pfizer, #Biontech and #Moderna.

Did you see ALL OF THEM?🤔

Find how to keep track below⬇️and build your #Publicaffairs #strategy! https://t.co/8nlP5BHdeX
